message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
Your 60-40 split seems a little off considering the inflation we're facing. How about we meet closer to the middle?  This offer will net you more than waiting.
Considering the inflation difference, I think 58-42 is a fairer split. Let's settle before the money devalues further
Alice, we're running out of time!  This offer is a good compromise.  Let's be realistic and close this deal.
I understand we're under pressure, but I still think I deserve a bit more. 56-44 is my final 'fair' offer before I start getting desperate
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  My offer is more than fair considering the rapid devaluation.  Take it or leave it, because I'm done negotiating!
